授業目的: This course examines the development and characteristics of Japanese foodways in modern times within and outside Japan. Students will be encouraged to understand Japanese food from multiple global perspectives.
到達目標: By taking this course students will gain a critical understanding of modern Japanese foodways as well as their relation to history, politics, economics, and culture. They will also learn to apply insights into Japanese food to other food cultures and social phenomena.
